Title: Provides for additional remedies for patients' private right of actions in residential health care facilities
Summary: Provides for additional remedies for patients' private right of actions in residential health care facilities; allows class actions by patients, patient's legal representative, or such patient's estate.
LawCode: Amd ยง2801-d, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to remedies available in private actions by patients of residential health care facilities
